### PrintAsmMemoryOperand() {#abd31e9ad15d84356f971b4c2340bbbd0}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool LoongArchAsmPrinter::PrintAsmMemoryOperand (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42; MI, unsigned OpNo, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> char &#42; ExtraCode, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp; OS)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Print the specified operand of MI, an INLINEASM instruction, using the specified assembler variant as an address.

Targets should override this to format as appropriate. This method can return true if the operand is erroneous.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/loongarch/loongarchasmprinter-h/#l00042">42</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/loongarch/loongarchasmprinter-h">LoongArchAsmPrinter.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/loongarch/loongarchasmprinter-cpp/#l00137">137</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/loongarch/loongarchasmprinter-cpp">LoongArchAsmPrinter.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### PrintAsmOperand() {#ae87b9efb9db9ad27a0f5f7d753ce45fd}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool LoongArchAsmPrinter::PrintAsmOperand (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42; MI, unsigned OpNo, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> char &#42; ExtraCode, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp; O)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Print the specified operand of MI, an INLINEASM instruction, using the specified assembler variant.

PrintAsmOperand - Print the specified operand of MI, an INLINEASM instruction, using the specified assembler variant.

Targets should override this to format as appropriate. This method can return true if the operand is erroneous.

Targets should override this to format as appropriate for machine specific ExtraCodes or when the arch-independent handling would be too complex otherwise.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/loongarch/loongarchasmprinter-h/#l00040">40</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/loongarch/loongarchasmprinter-h">LoongArchAsmPrinter.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/loongarch/loongarchasmprinter-cpp/#l00072">72</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/loongarch/loongarchasmprinter-cpp">LoongArchAsmPrinter.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
